comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: AUDIOSEROS on November 02, 2023, 05:35:55 PMDear EveryoneHello all together, I am in a pretty worse case because I did an absolut fatal mistake within an verification process.I need to pay for unlocking my account exactly 39706 USDT. I can imediatly payback the whole amount and give a bonus thanks of 5000 USDT back within 15 - 20 minutes after the verification done.My biggest problem is that my deadline for unlock is today and I still have no way to solve it because my whole money is in it and I need to repeat the verification succesfull.If there is someone who could help me It would safe my life at all.this is not a scam or fraud you can contact me in whatsapp for more details.Thanks if there is someone who can help me out my dilema.+4917655858283[/b]If you are serious on this ( and I don't think so) there is a very high probability that you are being scammed. Do not send any more money to any entity asking for more money to unlock your money.

comments.author: AUDIOSEROS
comments.body: I use the Platform for a long time and they do paid everything out within minutes.But as all recognized since the Ethereum Network has upgraded to Ethereum 2.0 the penalty cost get much higherTo participate in a Eth node you need at least to have 32 eth. If there is made a mistake you can count on penalty cost in 16 eth at allEveryone can read this all on ethereum.org This is not a scam or any fraud. People should read before they act in hurry. Also I know that or everyone know for what Crypto landscapes are famous for. And this is sadly but truely the Scam and fraud scene.If someone still interested to help I would be thankful for contacting me in whatsapp.I can guarantee a payback within 15-20 minutes.All the data and information you want from me you will get imediatly.forwarding thanks

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Some of you really daydream a lot.OP, Who in their right mind is going to lend a brand-new account an unsecured loan of 39,706 USDT? Not even a trusted member in the community can get that much these days.Maybe try a bank.
